original_text: Your gold and silver are corroded. Their corrosion will testify against you and eat your flesh like fire. You have hoarded wealth in the last days.
korean_text: 너희 금과 은은 녹이 슬었으니 이 녹이 너희에게 증거가 되며 불 같이 너희 살을 먹으리라 너희가 말세에 재물을 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: Your gold and silver are corroded.
Their corrosion will testify against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부식이 당신을 대적하여 증거할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: and eat your flesh like fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 불처럼 당신의 살을 먹을 것입니다.
